description: Bridges To Bremen is a long-running show by the Stones in the fifth and final stage of the Bridges To Babylon Tour. Filmed in the Weserstadion of the German city on September 2, 1998, the band had already completed four stages in the stadiums and arenas of North America (twice), Asia and South America before finally landing in Europe in early that summer.

Always innovative, Bridges To Babylon was a tour of novelties: the first time the band hit the road with a permanent B stage, and also the first time fans could vote on the band's website for a song that They wanted to hear at the show - Memory Motel in the case of Bremen fans.
products.title: Bridges to Bremen 3LP

description: The latest set of vinyl LPs, the complete collection of Queen's studio albums, remastered to the highest standards of quality in both audio and artwork.
products.title: Jazz

side-1: What Do You Want from Me?
description: It is the fourteenth studio album by British progressive rock band Pink Floyd. In the United Kingdom it was released on March 28, 1994, through the company EMI Records, and in the United States a week later, through Columbia Records. It is the second studio album published since the departure of the original bassist and founding member Roger Waters.

Composed mostly by guitarist David Gilmour and keyboardist Richard Wright, the central theme of the album is communication between people, or lack thereof, accompanied by other related topics such as isolation, ambiguity, confrontation or self defense.
products.title: The Division Bell

side-1: I’m Happy Just to Dance with You
description: The album, although showing the development of the talents of the group's composers, maintained the structure of songs and instrumentation of basic rock and roll. It was the first album of the group to contain only original compositions and the only one in which the musical catalog was signed entirely by Lennon-McCartney. Normally, Paul McCartney and John Lennon contribute equally with their songs in the making of each album of The Beatles, but in A Hard Day's Night Lennon's authorship in the composition of the songs was predominant, being responsible for the majority of the thirteen songs that were presented on this album.
products.title: A Hard Day’s Night

side-2: Is This The World We Created...?
description: Island Records re-releases the five Queen albums of this era on September 5 (coinciding with the date that Freddie Mercury would have turned 65) as part of the band's 40th anniversary celebrations: 'The Works',' A Kind Of Magic ',' The Miracle ',' Innuendo 'and' Made In Heaven '. The new releases will be accompanied by the third installment of the series 'Queen: Deep Cuts', which includes some of the lesser known songs from these albums.

Many of Queen's favorite tracks were released in this period, including 'Radio Gaga' (the theme from which Lady Gaga got her name), 'I Want To Break Free' (accompanied by the famous video where transvestites parodied Coronation Street and that the MTV banned in the US), 'One Vision', 'A Kind of Magic', 'I Want It All', 'The Miracle' and 'These Are The Days of Our Lives' (which includes the unforgettable last appearance of Freddie on video).
products.title: The Works

side-2: It’s Only Rock‘n’ Roll (But I Like It)
description: It is a compilation album of the Rolling Stones, released on April 19, 2019 through Promotone BV and Universal Music. It has tracks from each of his studio albums since 1971. Honk includes the 18 tracks of the 1993 "Jump Back" compilation. The standard edition includes 36 tracks, while the deluxe edition adds 10 additional tracks from recent live recordings.
products.title: Honk

side-1: Shine On You Crazy Diamond(Parts I-V)
Shine On You Crazy Diamond(Parts VI-IX)
description: It is the second Pink Floyd album to use a conceptual theme written entirely by Waters, and evokes his feeling that the camaraderie that had once been felt among the band members, had long been absent. instrumental introduction of eight and a half minutes, before starting with "Shine On You Crazy Diamond". This is a tribute to the former band member Syd Barrett, forced to leave the band due to a nervous breakdown due to drug use that caused him mental problems a few years earlier.
products.title: Wish You Were Here

description: A special box of the historic 1977 Queen album News of the World is here, marking the 40th anniversary of the original release.The new package includes the original album on CD, plus two additional CDs of extractions and oddities recently discovered from the band's archives, one of which is a newly created 'alternative' version of the entire album: Raw Sessions.

Another outstanding feature of this heavy 40th anniversary box is a new pure analog cut of the original vinyl LP, directly from the non-mastered analog master mix tapes. There is also a rich selection of NOTW-related memories that include three posters and a 60-page picture book, mostly never seen before.
products.title: News of the World

description: The latest set of vinyl LPs, the complete collection of Queen's studio albums, remastered to the highest standards of quality in both audio and artwork.
products.title: Queen

description: It is the sixth studio album by British progressive rock band Pink Floyd, released in October 1971. It was recorded in several recording studios in the London area, including Abbey Road Studios. Without new material to work with and without having a clear idea of the direction they wanted the album to take, the band developed a series of novel experiments that finally served as inspiration for the best known track on the album, "Echoes." Although many of the group's subsequent albums focused on a unique theme with lyrics written mostly by Roger Waters, Meddle was a group effort with lyrical contributions from each member.

It was recorded and produced from January to August 1971 among the obligations of the tours. The reviews of music critics were relatively good for this work. The disc was a commercial success in the United Kingdom, however, in the USA. The mediocre publicity of his American distributor led him to be a sales failure in that country.
products.title: Meddle

side-2: Las Palabras De Amor (The Words Of Love)
